attributes.action: Demand that Walkers crisps put more crisps in the bag
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When I used to buy Walkers crisps, I always found that when I opened the bag, there was only about 5 crisps sitting in the bottom.

Mr Brown, this is not fair and the bag should be full of the delicious snack.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
